title: A Knowledge Engineering Primer. (arXiv:2305.17196v1 [cs.AI])
abstract: The aim of this primer is to introduce the subject of knowledge engineering in a concise but synthetic way to develop the reader's intuition about the area.
context:
Title: A Knowledge Engineering Primer. (arXiv:2305.17196v1 [cs.AI])
Abstract: The aim of this primer is to introduce the subject of knowledge engineering in a concise but synthetic way to develop the reader's intuition about the area.
translated_abstract: 这篇文章的目的是以简洁而综合的方式介绍知识工程的主题，以培养读者对该领域的直觉。
tldr: 该文介绍了知识工程的基本概念，帮助读者了解该领域并建立直觉。
en_tdlr: This paper introduces the fundamental concepts of knowledge engineering, helping readers to understand the field and develop intuition.
